channel.title: 🏢 School of Computer Science and Technology, Tongji University, China on NeurIPS 2024
channel.description: Recent content in 🏢 School of Computer Science and Technology, Tongji University, China on NeurIPS 2024

item.title: DDR: Exploiting Deep Degradation Response as Flexible Image Descriptor
item.description: Deep Degradation Response (DDR) uses image deep feature changes under degradation to create a flexible image descriptor, excelling in blind image quality assessment and unsupervised image restoration.
